chatapp.messages.chat

Class Add

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatapp.messages.chat.Add
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdd, IChatroomMsg, IMessage, java.io.Serializable

    public class Add
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAdd
    This message is sent to a chatroom by a user who wishes to join that chatroom. The datapacket containing an IAdd will contain the message receiver stub of the sender in the datapacket's sender field. The receiver should get this message receiver and add it to their local copy of the chatroom. The message contains a serialized user stub for the sender. Thus, the user should call getUserStub() on this message and get the user stub of the sender. If they don't already have that user stub, they should call registerUser() on that stub so they can connect to them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
